name: Wet Girl
detailed_description:
Story Background

The daughter of a nightclub owner ask you for help to oppose their competitor. You will sneak into the nightclub and spray the dancing girls inside.

Gameplay

This game adopt first-person perspective. Control the role movement and spray from the proper angle. Spray the girls'clothes wet completely, and you will complete the task.

Features

  • The unique first-person spray game
  • Sweet, Sexy Girl's hot dance
  • Wet body temptation
  • Characteristic, only play once, lifelong unforgettable!

Best experience

The biggest highlight of the game is to watch girls dancing in the stage 3, 7 in free mode! .
Lovely sexy girls, changing styles of dance, dynamic dance music, ambient lighting flashing with the rhythm of dance music, together create a nightclub atmosphere. This is the core experience that the game will bring to players!

The famous violinist Lindsey Stirling played the violin on the New York subway, and no passers-by stopped. Not because the audience doesn't understand music! Rather, beautiful music requires a lot of foils, energetic beautiful girls, brisk dance steps, smart expressions, warm and quiet environment, which can greatly enhance the experience of listening to music!

The dances in the game are generated by capturing real girl's motion according to the world's most popular dance, and the animation itself is top quality! However, if there is no foil, the experience is not good. For the best experience, keep the following in mind:
  • 1. Graphics card Nvidia GTX970 or better;
  • 2. Display: Resolution 1920*1080 or higher, support sRGB or better, curved screen, 23 inches or larger;
  • 3. Full screen;
  • 4. The environment should be dim and quiet;
  • 5.Bose QC20 noise canceling headphones or better;
  • 6. The game volume must be large enough;

short_description: This is a unique first-person spray game. Take a water gun and spray the hot dancing girls, and wet their clothes completely, and then you win. When you see their angry expressions and hear their quick panting, don't stop spraying for the sake of your pity on them.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Russian
reviews:
“These default assets are getting me rock hard.”
Gorilla Gonko the Shield Hero

“I will give tribute to the girls, because they continue to dance at the moment of obvious mockery. Mademoiselle dance beautifully, energetically and believably, which is worthy of purchase.”
Грустный жульен

“The girls Dance too Just like In IRL Nightclubs haha I would Recc this game to ANyone Who Likes Welll These Types of Games ^^”

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3 4160T or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT720 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 4460 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some naked and pornographic content. All characters are over 18 years old
